article_title: Feds Launch Internet Sales Tax Again, So Better Click While You Can

article_metadata.author: Robert W. Wood

og.description: The Marketplace Fairness Act is reintroduced and being pushed hard. It could mean the days of no sales tax for online purchases are fast closing.
